txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Scribe a tome of winter survival for the people of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled scholar such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by scribing a tome of winter survival for them.

'I hear that you are a scholar among your other talents, [placeholder].\n\n'Do you have any bits of lore that could be turned into a tome of sorts, full of knowledge that will help the people endure this cold climate?'
Scripted a tome of winter survival ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Hildelith has given you a recipe for a tome of winter survival.\n\nYou should craft a tome of winter survival for the survivors of Wildermore's bitter winter.
'Ah, this will be very helpful, [placeholder]! Thank you for this; it is an honour to read of such deep knowledge of winter and survival.'
Deliver the tome of winter survival to Hildelith
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have scripted a tome of winter survival, and should now deliver it to Hildelith.
